article:
Saturday, 30 October
Father's birthday is coming, so I decided to put up a bookself for my father because he loves _ and has many books.
I _ the building materials online. My best friend Daniel came to help me and brought some _ . We read the instructions first and _ started to work. Daniel is good at DIY and is really _ . It took us only an hour to finish the work. I had a little _ using the hammer. Daniel taught me _ to use it properly and we had fun working together.
We also tried to paint the bookself blue-my father's favourite _ . When we finished, it _ really cool.
I feel happy with my work _ I believe my father will be proud of it as well.
